      • deleteStudent

        public void deleteStudent(java.lang.String reference,
                          java.lang.String type)
        Important: Can delete Student at any positon in the double linked list given the Student ID or Name. This method gets a String reference ID or Name of student to be deleted from the list.
        Parameters:
        reference - the reference ID or Name of the node to be deleted
        type - an indication ID or Name that is being given

      • searchStudentByID

        public Node searchStudentByID(java.lang.String ID)
        Method searches a student given a String ID of the student
        Parameters:
        ID - the id of the Student to look for
        Returns:
        Student if the Student is found in the list, null otherwise

      • searchStudentByName

        public Node searchStudentByName(java.lang.String name)
        Method searches a student given a String name of the student
        Parameters:
        name - the id of the Student to look for
        Returns:
        Student if the Student is found in the list, null otherwise

      • saveStudentList

        public void saveStudentList(StudentList studentList)
        saveStudentList(StudentList studentList) Given a list, the method saves it to the external file
        Parameters:
        studentList - A doublelinked list of Students

      • readStudentList

        public StudentList readStudentList()
        readStudentList()
        Returns:
        StudentList object read from a file or Null if object found
